author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sanlam Says Raised 5.7 Bln Rand Via Placing
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Sanlam Ltd:
* ‍TOTAL OF 65.5 MILLION NEW ORDINARY SHARES IN COMPANY HAVE BEEN PLACED BY J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC AND DEUTSCHE BANK AG​
* ‍PLACING AT A PRICE OF ZAR87.00 PER SHARE, RAISING GROSS PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY ZAR5 700 MILLION​
* ‍PLACING SHARES BEING ISSUED REPRESENT APPROXIMATELY 3.0% OF COMPANY’S ISSUED ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
